TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RowToParametersTransformer extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters
Public NotInheritable Class RowToParametersTransformer Inherits WebPartTransformer Implements IWebPartParameters
type RowToParametersTransformer = class inherit WebPartTransformer interface IWebPartParameters

Docs.summary: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Transformers are used in a Web Parts connection to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ConsumerFieldNames { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.ConsumerFieldNames : string[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the list of names in the consumer that will receive the values from the provider.
Docs.value: An array of values representing the consumer fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ConsumerFieldNames%2A> property represents the fields in the consumer that will receive the transformed data from the provider. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ConsumerFieldNames%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many consumer field names as needed are assigned to the `ConsumerFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ConsumerFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Control CreateConfigurationControl() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateConfigurationControl () As Control

Docs.summary: Provides an ASP.NET control that allows the user to configure a transformer in the zone.
Docs.returns: An ASP.NET control that displays a user interface (UI) that allows the user to configure a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically. A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` element. A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a Web page and the user is in the connect mode. When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.
The configuration control displays a UI that allows the user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row data to connect with the field data of the consumer. The control is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> zone.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the list of field names from the provider.
Docs.value: An array of values representing the provider fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ProviderFieldNames%2A> property represents the fields in the provider that the transformer will pass to the consumer. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.ProviderFieldNames%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many provider field names as needed are assigned to the `ProviderFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ProviderFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.Transform%2A> method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> so it can be used by the consumer.
